channel.title: Portals easyrsc help
channel.description: okay im working on my server and i ran into a problem because i took out the adventurers and added portals with tele locs and everything but when i click on the portals it send me to the first loc i placed on it well help pleas

item.title: Portals easyrsc help
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

owner.setBusy(true); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@Where do you want to be teleported to ?"); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { String[] options = new String[]{"Dragon area", "Varrock", "Dragon maze", "Mage Arena"}; owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) { public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) { switch(option) { case 0: // Dragon area owner.teleport(183, 257, true); break; case 1: // varrock owner.teleport(136, 505, true); break; case 2: // Dragon maze owner.teleport(271, 195, true); break; case 3: // Mage arena owner.teleport(446, 3374, true); break;

Add something like that so it will show you a list of where to be tele’d to… If that was infact what you are wanting to do…

Read full topic
